glosses: naked as the day one was born, in one's birthday suit; completely naked

examples.text: Bornozunu çıkardı ve anadan doğma havuza girdi.
examples.translation: She took off her bathrobe and went into the pool completely naked.

examples.text: Hiç aşık olmamış birine aşkı anlatmak, anadan doğma kör birine yakamozların güzelliğini anlatmaya benzer.
examples.translation: Describing love to someone who's never fallen in love is like describing the beauty of the moonlight's reflection off the sea to someone who is blind since birth.

etymology: From ana (“mother”) + -dan (ablative suffix) + doğ- (“to be born”) + -ma (verbal noun suffix), literally “as one was born from their mother”.
